data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Mount Lebanon.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mount Lebanon, Lebanon
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Mount Lebanon, Lebanon.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Mount Lebanon.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Mount Lebanon, Lebanon humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Romani, Domari people might believe through him.
Lord, please give the 11,937 believers in the state of Mount Lebanon the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, help the 11,937 believers in Mount Lebanon to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,667,263 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mount Lebanon, Lebanon has a population of 1,679,200.

We estimate Mount Lebanon has 11,937 people who might know Jesus, 539,838 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,127,425 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 140 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Mount Lebanon, Lebanon that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.
